Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Aika de lokam ne rasulam tom inakara kita
Jadom su'aiba ne unham nu kiha, ki tusim darade nahim
Maim tuhade la'i ika bharosemada rasula ham
Isa la'i alaha tom daro ate meri gala mano
Ate maim isa la'i tuhade tom ko'i seva fala nahim' magada, mera seva fala sasara de malaka alaha kola hai
Tusi' loka pura-pura tolo ate nukasana karana vali'am vica samila na hovo
Ate takari di dadi sidhi rakha ke toli'a karom
Ate lokam nu unham di ciza ghata ke na di'u ate dharati te vigara na karo
Ate usa hasati tom daro jisa ne tuhanu ate tuhadi'am pichali'am pirhi'am nu paida kita hai
Unham ne kiha tuhade upara tam kise ne jadu kara dita hai
Ate tusim sade varage hi ika manukha ho. Ate asim tam tuhanu jhuthe lokam vicom samajhade ham
Isa la'i sade upara asamana to ko'i tukara degau je tusim sace ho
Su'aiba ne akhi'a, mera raba cagi tar'ham janada hai, jo kujha tusim kara rahe ho
Tam unham ne usa nu jhuthala dita. Phira unham nu badala vale dina di afata ne pharha li'a
Besaka uha ika vade dina di saza si. Besaka isa vica nisani hai ate unham vicom zi'adatara manana vale nahim
Ate besaka tuhada raba sakatisali ate rahimata vala hai
